biotools.summary: Tool that searches for low complexity regions of DNA or protein sequences. Using it you can search long sequences (chromosomes, genomes) or a set of aligned sequences. This resource also contains links to other algorithms for evaluating the complexity of sequences.

bioschemas.name: LowComplexity
